00027 
00028 class SampleUnit : DataspaceUnit{
00029         // note that we aren't using the SI base unit for time, because the SI base unit for time is a bit wacky
00030         // we are just going to use ms because that is the native unit for Max
00031         private:
00032                 long    sample_rate;    
00033                 double  msr;                    
00034                 double  rmsr;                   
00035 
00036         public:
00037                 SampleUnit();
00038                 ~SampleUnit();
00039                 
00040                 void convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output);
00041                 void convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms);
00042 };
00043
